Package millionaire.View

Class LifeLine

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
javafx.scene.control.Labeled
javafx.scene.control.Label
millionaire.View.LifeLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
class LifeLine
extends javafx.scene.control.Label
A class for creating the different lifelinesimages at the top of the screen and their view properties. Its a label and belongs to the View.
Author:
Henrik, Mohammad, Joakim

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void disableAction()
    Disable the label and calling the other methods that will switch the image and set it as used.
    (package private) boolean isUsed()
    It returns a boolean value depending on life lines used variable value.
    (package private) void reset()
    method that resets LifeLine to default state when starting a new game.
    (package private) void setAction()
    Creating lambda expressions when clicking at the lifeline to clear the lifelinehint,
    disable current lifeline, disable the withdrawbutton, disable the answerbuttons,
    temporarily disable the other lifelines, play a sound, stopping the timer and activate the lifeline.
    private void setAsUsed()
    Setting the lifeline as used to prevent the player to use it again.
    private void switchToUsedImage()
    To switch image to the one with a red cross when used the lifeline.

  • Field Details

    • used

      private boolean used
      It stores a boolean value that show if a life line have used (true) or not (false).

    • img

      private final javafx.scene.image.ImageView img
      Its the image of the lifeline.

    • type

      private final java.lang.String type
      It stores a string that refers to a lifeline type.

      private final java.lang.String SoundEffectName
      It store audio tuck name that is related to a life line.

  • Constructor Details

    • LifeLine

      LifeLine​(java.lang.String LifeLineType, java.lang.String SoundEffectName)
      It is a constructor method creates a LifeLine object.
      Parameters:
      LifeLineType - String including which lifeline to be created.
      SoundEffectName - String including which soundeffectname the lifelineobject will earn.

  • Method Details

    • switchToUsedImage

      private void switchToUsedImage()
      To switch image to the one with a red cross when used the lifeline.

    • setAction

      void setAction()
      Creating lambda expressions when clicking at the lifeline to clear the lifelinehint,
      disable current lifeline, disable the withdrawbutton, disable the answerbuttons,
      temporarily disable the other lifelines, play a sound, stopping the timer and activate the lifeline.

    • disableAction

      private void disableAction()
      Disable the label and calling the other methods that will switch the image and set it as used.

    • reset

      void reset()
      method that resets LifeLine to default state when starting a new game.

    • setAsUsed

      private void setAsUsed()
      Setting the lifeline as used to prevent the player to use it again.

    • isUsed

      boolean isUsed()
      It returns a boolean value depending on life lines used variable value.
      Returns:
      True or false depending if the lifeline is used or not.
